mosinstall.name: RSS
mosinstall.author: Joomla! Project
mosinstall.copyright: (C) 2005 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
mosinstall.description: This module shows a specific RSS feed

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: rssurl
param.label: RSS URL
param.description: Enter the URL of the RSS/RDF feed

param.name: rssdesc
param.label: Feed Description
param.description: Show the description text for the whole Feed

param.name: rssimage
param.label: Feed Image
param.description: Show the image associated with the whole Feed

param.name: rssitems
param.label: Items
param.description: Enter number of RSS items to display

param.name: rssitemdesc
param.label: Item Description
param.description: Show the description or intro text of individual news items

param.name: word_count
param.label: Word Count
param.description: Allows you to limit the amount of visible item description text. 0 will show all the text

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module
